summary: priscilla presley will serve as a witness at the first wedding to be held at an all - new chapel of love in las vegas . the 69 - year - old collaborated with nbc 's today show to launch a contest for one elvis - obsessed couple to win the ' ultimate wedding ' . the winning duo - announced next monday - will tie the knot at elvis presley 's graceland wedding chapel inside the westgate hotel on thursday , april 23 .
aspect: Priscilla Presley will act as a witness for the first wedding at an all-new chapel of love in Las Vegas, Westgate Hotel. The couple will win a free wedding reception and hotel suite for two nights, plus airfares and concert tickets to the Elvis Experience theater show. The chapel is an extension of the Graceland exhibit outside Elvis' Memphis, Tennessee, home.
explain: Priscilla Presley will be a witness at the first wedding held at the new "Chapel of Love" in Las Vegas, which is an extension of the Graceland exhibit. The winning couple will get a free wedding reception, hotel stay, airfare, and concert tickets to Elvis Experience theater show.The chapel is located in the Westgate Hotel and the announcement of the winning couple will take place next Monday for their special event on April 23rd.
